word: 24 (Mark 8:34; Luke 9:23; see EGW on Matthew 11:28-30). Travel Christ's Road.--Those who are saved must travel the same road over which Christ journeyed. He says, "Whosoever will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me." The character is to be formed according to the Christlikeness (MS 105, 1901).
